Common.Highlight.Common.Text: Uptown Mentor is a 38,483 SF retail/ restaurant and office development on Mentor Avenue in the absolute heart of Mentor, Ohio
10,958 SF first floor retail/restaurant availability with potential for a 4,965 SF rooftop enclosed space with immediately adjacent 2,318 SF open air patio
Office Leasing Asking Rate: $24.00 MG - Tenants responsible for Maintenance & Utilities
The project is slated to break ground Spring 2022 with January 2023 Tenant delivery
Mentor Avenue has high traffic counts of 23,205 VPD (Source ODOT)
Extremely visible location with excellent signage opportunity
Uptown Mentor will rejuvenate a historic stretch of Mentor Avenue to create a new vibrant walkable downtown district in the absolute heart of Mentor.

Mentor, OH is the 6th largest retail market in Ohio, and features the likes of big box retailers such as Meijer, Target, Walmart, Sams Club, Menards, TJ Maxx, HomeGoods, Ulta, Best Buy, At Home, Hobby Lobby, Dickâ€™s Sporting Goods and many more.

Mentor is home to many national casual dining and fast casual restaurants, including: Outback, Longhorn, Smokey Bones, Quaker Steak, Mission BBQ, Chipotle, Chick-fil-A, CoreLife, Panda Express, Five Guys and many more.

Mentor boasts 1,700 businesses with 3.3 million square feet of retail development and 3,200 acres zoned for manufacturing, with a 4.2% industrial vacancy rate. With 300 manufacturers in Mentor, the city ranks as the seventh-largest base facilities of production in Ohio.
The market has a 5 mile population of 105,235 people and daytime population of 105,138 people.
The market has a 5 mile average household income of $93,009.
There is no development quiet like Uptown Mentor within that 5 mile area.

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text: Uptown Mentor is a 37,340 SF retail/ restaurant and office development on Mentor Avenue in the absolute heart of Mentor, Ohio. 11,280 SF first floor retail/restaurant availability with potential for a 5,200 SF rooftop enclosed space with immediately adjacent 2,320 SF open air patio.

Common.Strapline.Common.Text: An Exciting New Mixed-Use Development, Creating a New Walkable Downtown District in the heart of Mentor
